message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper focuses on natural language processing and specifically on speech act recognition, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The proposed technique for SA recognition involves the use of machine learning algorithms, which is a common topic in AI research.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper utilizes four classification methods to evaluate the proposed technique, which is a common topic in machine learning research.
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval): SA recognition can be useful in information retrieval applications, as it can help identify the intended language function of a text.
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks): The paper also discusses the application of SA recognition in identifying common SAs in rumors on social media, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
